Package scoring

Class alpha

java.lang.Object
scoring.alpha
public class alpha
extends java.lang.Object
The Alpha class has the purpose of calculating and storing the information of a connection between 2 nodes. Each alpha object encapsulates information about the connection. This state of information contains:

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int _N
    The number of instances calculated through calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
    private double[] _N_C
    The number of instances regarding class possibilities calculated through calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
    private double[][] _N_J
    The number of instances regarding class and son node possibilities calculated through calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
    private double[][] _N_K
    The number of instances regarding class and parent node possibilities calculated through calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
    private int[][][] _Source
    The number of every possibility of instance calculated through calcN(ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList, ArrayList)
    private double _weigth
    The weight of the edge calculated through Edges.calcScore(alpha)

    • calcN

      public void calcN​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> parent, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> parentvalues, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> son, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> sonvalues, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> classes, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> classvalues)
      Calculates every value of N_ijkc needed for the current edge along with the other Ns from the N_ijkc values
      Parameters:
      parent - - Instances of the parent feature
      parentvalues - - Unique values of the parent feature
      son - - Instances of the son feature
      sonvalues - - Unique values of the son feature
      classes - - Instances of the classes
      classvalues - - Unique values of the classes
